overview: In Naked Afternoon, adorable Thomasina is the calmest and softest teenage girl you have ever seen. Having a job of masseuse in an elite Beverly Hills spa, she meets a rich erotic film producer who promises her a stunning career in movies. Beginning from a small adult movie, she completes a dizzying rise to the top of the erotic world.
tagline: She's Just 19 and She's Just Too Much!
title: Naked Afternoon
